testcase.classname: User tests the user info segment
testcase.name: TC_0004_User tests the user info settings email textbox

failure.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of Proxy element for: DefaultElementLocator 'By.xpath: //form[@id='settings-form]/div[3][@class='text-danger form-group']/div[@class='invalid-feedback']' (tried for 2 second(s) with 500 milliseconds interval)

testcase.failure:
